Key Match Events: Senegal and Burundi played a 1-1 draw in their last meeting
Burundi secured a 3-2 away win over Malawi in their previous match
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal is looking to recover from a slow start in their AFCON qualifying campaign
Burundi is the Group L leader
Post-Match Reflections: Senegal's coach, Aliou Cisse, was disappointed with the result but defended the team's game plan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Bingu National Stadium in Lilongwe, Malawi
